1370: Strom moved to Muurhuysen2.D.6 after marriage.
Got married to Aue at age 19 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Aue, Emgelberna, at age 19.
1371: Had a daughter with Aue, Woltwigis, at age 20.
1373: Had a son with Aue, Batten, at age 22.
1374: Had a daughter with Aue, Kerstine, at age 23.
1375: Had a daughter with Aue, Lutghardis, at age 24.
1376: Had a daughter with Aue, Heile, at age 25.
1377: Lost his wife Aue while she was giving birth to Heile in 1377.
Became caretaker of Emgelberna, Woltwigis, Batten, Kerstine, Lutghardis, Heile, Heile at age 27.
1380: Lost daughter Heile when Heile was 5 years old.
1385: Lost daughter Heile when Heile was 9 years old.
1394: Lost son Batten when Batten was 22 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
